name: Space of Darkness
description: Space of Darkness tells the story of a mechanic who works on a space station. The mechanic is alone on the ship for a few months. One day the power suddenly cuts off. He soon finds himself alone in the dark corridors of a space station. Can you unearth what truly happened on the space station?
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows 7,8,8.1,10 Processor: Single-Core Memory: 1 GB RAM Graphics: GT 730 or equivalent DirectX: Version 8.0 Storage: 800 MB available space Additional Notes: 16:9 Resolution!
recommended_requirements: OS: Windows 7,8,8.1,10 Processor: Quad-Core Memory: 4 GB RAM Graphics: GTX 750 or equivalent DirectX: Version 11 Storage: 3 GB available space Additional Notes: 1920x1080p!
